name: Gilded Age
overview: A strategy game, created by Markus Schneider and published in Golden Disk 64 1991/05. GILDED AGE- Take on the role of a Northern General fighting the armies of the South in this gripping strategy game! Do extensive research into a historical tactical game that also contains a lot of action. Tons of mesmerizing graphics and realistic battle sounds make this game a real hit! There are many different action areas for the player to choose from: building an army, attacking Native Americans. Train robberies, duels, etc.
